typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as integer,
		name as string,
		sal as integer,
		dept as string,
		gender as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 alterRow(updateIf(gender=='male')) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		empid as integer,
		name as string,
		salary as integer,
		dept as string,
		gender as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		empid = id,
		name,
		salary = sal,
		dept,
		gender
	)) ~> sink1
